title: The Way of the Cross: Freedom to Manifest the Master Pattern, Christ, Who is Himself Entirely Free.
description:
A conversation with Richard Rohlin, Orthodox Christian, husband, father, essayist, poet, data analyst, student of patterns.

Richard was home schooled and learned Greek and Hebrew at the kitchen table with his Dad. C S Lewis' book, The Discarded Image, set him on a path of studying the medieval world.

His website dedicated to finding a way to re-enchant our world. 
https://findingthegoldenkey.com

An anthology of essays to which he has contributed:
Amid Weeping there is Joy: Orthodox Perspectives
https://www.amazon.com/Amid-Weeping-There-Joy-Perspectives/dp/1951536126

The Amon Sul podcast at AncientFaith.com
https://www.ancientfaith.com/podcasts/amonsul?fbclid=IwAR2noBF2Cy-ceJQn3eMncVnHGQaPCaBVcdYXcjKtd58H-x_pm3zvY3uVBnw

The Ethics of Beauty by Timothy Patitsas
https://www.stnicholaspress.net/?fbclid=IwAR1XK3nEkF1D21ITebW8l1s6Nf9iBiGPra4qbrJs1x1JTA_Ju8YP2Rc5XeU

Richard's article at The Symbolic World:
https://thesymbolicworld.com/articles/the-symbolism-of-hagiography/?fbclid=IwAR2SYotVSCVod73GW_G6enbJAAaOIWIVI8FzkodftkyYI-U-pJIEWj1spjM
